comment: Dr Mills' classes are a lot of fun, but you wouldnt expect it when you first meet him. He comes off as monotone and absent-minded, but he actually has a very dry sense of humor which makes him hilarious. He is also willing to help you at all times, he replies to e-mails within an hour or two. He is a fair grader and gives good feedback

He's a good professor. Interesting... He is very monotone so it hard to understand when he is joking around. You really do not have to show up to class everything on needs is online especially with the essays.
